console.log().description: Logs a message to the console

document.getElementById().description: Gets an element by its ID

Array.isArray().description: Checks if a value is an array

Array.prototype.forEach().description: Executes a provided function once for each array element

Array.prototype.map().description: Creates a new array with the results of calling a provided function on every element

Array.prototype.filter().description: Creates a new array with all elements that pass the test implemented by the provided function

Array.prototype.reduce().description: Applies a function against an accumulator and each element in the array

Array.prototype.find().description: Returns the first element in the array that satisfies the provided testing function

Array.prototype.includes().description: Determines whether an array includes a certain value

String.prototype.length.description: Returns the length of a string

String.prototype.toUpperCase().description: Converts a string to uppercase letters

String.prototype.toLowerCase().description: Converts a string to lowercase letters

String.prototype.trim().description: Removes whitespace from both ends of a string

String.prototype.split().description: Splits a string into an array of substrings

String.prototype.indexOf().description: Returns the index within the string of the first occurrence of a specified value

String.prototype.substring().description: Returns the part of the string between the start
